original_title: Battle Diary: A Day In The Life of Charlie Martin
overview: An extraordinary journey into the past to that fateful day, June 6, 1944. Relive the event of D-Day on the beaches of Normandy with Company Sergeant-Major Charlie Martin of the Queen's Own Rifles. Experience an emotional and intensely personal account of D-Day through a combination of interviews, archival film and Charlie Martin's diary excerpts.
title: Battle Diary: A Day In The Life of Charlie Martin
